item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 1, 2024 at 6:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. UK ambassador to Mexico was sacked after pointing gun at staff
2. Donald Trump found guilty on all counts in ‘hush money’ trial
3. Trump campaign claims fundraising windfall in wake of guilty verdict
4. [Opinion] Trump’s guilty verdict puts America’s political system on trial
5. Ramaphosa’s future in doubt after disappointing South African election
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, June 1, 2024 at 6:15 AM UTC
